data.title: FY20 Donors
data.text:
2019-2020 Donor Roster

This list includes donors who contributed during the 2020 Fiscal Year (between July 1, 2019 and June 30, 2020).

$25,000+

$1,500–$2,499

$10,000–24,999

$100–1,499

$5,000–9,999

$99 and under

$2,500–4,999

Organizations & Foundations

2019-2020 Year after Year List

We recognize and thank those donors who give to COA year in and year out. It doesn’t matter the amount one gives, the steadfast support helps us achieve our mission each and every year.

Over 35 Years

Over 25 Years

Over 15 Years

Over 30 Years

Over 20 Years

Over 10 Years
